Coxsackie virus, whilst not very nice, is hand, foot and mouth and not the same as the foot and mouth disease cattle can have. I can remember having letters about it when my children where at nursery quite a few years ago, so unusual but not unheard of. And not pleasant at all to get on holiday.

As NicyCheshire says this is an unpleasant condition, but not unusual or dangerous.https:/…_and_mouth_diseaseI think people are confusing it with foot and mouth disease which is very different and affects livestock. It is not the same. This is something that mainly affects children and breakouts in schools and other places where children congregate are not uncommon.So although unpleasant, there is no need for mass panic.

My family are in turkey and the 11 month old babie has caught hand foot and mouth disease, soon after arriving. Ruined the whole holiday. This was hotel In manavgat side turkey. Quite a few people in hotel have the same. Very bad.

It's not adviseable to go all inclusive. I know it can work out cheaper for families, but nothing is worth putting the health of young children at risk. There are so many good 3* hotels in Turkey doing B & B, as well as S/C apartments, and hundreds of restaurants and lokantas serving good quality, fresh food, at prices so much cheaper than in the UK. You don't know who has handled the food at the buffet style dining areas of these hotels, and it's not the fault of the staff usually.
Yes, our 28 month old daughter got it last week at pegasos world side.

I can never understand anyone wanting to go all inclusive in Side when there are so very many wonderful restaurants close to hand and all at reasonable prices with excellent food - some with views of the sea - others overlooking the Apollo Temple where Anthony and Cleopatra fell in love - and yet more along the harbour.Good b and b s in Side are ... 1. The Beach House Hotel which has 12 rooms overlooking the sea and in the heart of Old Town Side yet on a quiet street and with its own private beach area. 2. Sunbird Hotel which is a 10 minute walk to the beach and then a further half hour walk along the promenade into Old Town Side. 3. Sun City Hotel which is very close to Sunbird and a lot bigger of a place. 4. Hanay Suites Hotel, also in that locality, surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops. Check the prices. i think you will be pleasantly surprised. x Angela in Side x

I totally agree, cannot understand anyone gong A.I anywhere in Turkey Hotels are so cheap as is eating out at a different wonderful restaurant every night. Is fabulous and a real experience of Turkey.
